metadata.name: Freedom
metadata.description:
They stab me with their words, and nothing comes out of my mouth.
They don't even let me see, and I can no longer even smell the flower you gave me.
What is wrong with me?
I just wanted to be free.
-----------------------------------------
digital collage | photoshop | 2300 x 3200
Image by Inna Mikitas from Pixabay
